DOC.brief_summary: Objective . To evaluate effect intake two type whole corn tortilla one traditional tortilla glycemic index ( GI ) insulinemic index ( InIn ) adult diabetes , overweight clinically healthy . Material method . Type crossover clinical trial adult 20-69 year . Three group participant include category ( n = 27 group ) : 1 ) adult diabetes , b ) adult overweight c ) clinically healthy adult . The glycemic insulinemic index measure group participant give random order follow food : 1 ) whole corn tortilla ( white `` criollo '' corn= 5.3 % fiber ) , 2 ) whole corn tortilla ( white `` hybrid '' corn= 7.9 % ) , 3 ) traditional corn tortilla ( 3.9 % fiber ) , 4 ) white bread ( reference food contain 2.2 % fiber ) . For calculation GI InIn follow `` FAO '' methodology . For evaluation food leave range 1 week .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Index Insulinemic Index 3 Types Tortilla Mexican Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Objective . To evaluate effect intake two type whole corn tortilla , one traditional tortilla Glycemic Index ( GI ) Insulinemic Index ( InIn ) adult diabetes , overweight clinically healthy . Material method . A randomised crossover , single-blinded study design undertake adult 20-69 year . The study use 3-arm : 1 ) Adults diabetes ( n=27 ) ; b ) adult overweight ( n=27 ) ; c ) clinically healthy adult ( n=27 ) . During week run-in period subject record normal habitual diet 7d . Individuals request maintain normal exercise , sleep pattern report test . Upon arrival laboratory , participant weight body composition determine . Overnight fast ( 8-12 hour ) participant report Research Center Mexican National Institute Public Health 4 occasion separate least one week . The glycemic insulinemic index measure group participant give random order follow food 1-week washout period : 1 ) whole corn tortilla ( white `` criollo '' corn= 5.3 % fiber ) , 2 ) whole corn tortilla ( white `` hybrid '' corn= 7.9 % ) , 3 ) traditional corn tortilla ( 3.9 % fiber ) , 4 ) white bread ( reference food contain 2.2 % fiber ) . The ration shall 50g carbohydrate available ( approximately equivalent 4 tortilla 4 bread , respectively ) . Blood sample collect 0 , 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 120 minute completion test meal . Insulin glucose measure electrochemiluminescence hexokinase method , respectively . The GI value determine accord Food Agriculture Organization United Nations ( FAO ) . The area curve calculate incremental area blood glucose response curve test individual . This study sample volunteer perform follow approval ethic Committee Mexican National Public Health Institute
DOC.criteria: One group ( n=27 ) diagnosis type 2 diabetes document fast blood glucose . One group ( n=27 ) overweight Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > =25 kg/m2 One group ( n=27 ) healthy adult without non communicable chronic disease Alterations associate digestion bariatric surgery
